welcome.name: Welcome
welcome.title: Thank you for installing the EAQ Brasil Banda Larga app
welcome.description: We'll start by reviewing the privacy policies to make your experience more comfortable and secure.

permissions.name: Permissions
permissions.description: In order for your broadband connection to be properly checked, you must enable the following permissions on your device:
permissions.text: If you agree, then please grant the necessary permissions, review the terms of use and proceed with your assessment as normal.

content.title: Your geographic location
content.description: (Required to identify the best server for your test)

content.title: Media access
content.description: (Required only for storing test records on your device)

content.title: Phone calls
content.description: (Required to identify the best server for your test)

content.paragraph: The app can collect your location data for standalone measurements even when closed or unused.
These measurements will only be carried out when there is no competition in use, avoiding impact on navigability and harm to the user.
Standalone measurements will not be charged to the subscriber's deductible.

grantPermissions.name: Grant Permissions
grantPermissions.description: Allow EAQ app to access location from device?

network.name: Network Type
network.title: This is the type of network you are using:

home.name: Home
home.paragraph: Congratulations you have accessed the EAQ Brasil Banda Larga app
